lang.title: Select the Language
lang.subtitle:
please select which language you want.
 you can change later on profile.

reg1.title: Vehical Registration
reg1.question: Do you own vehicle you're going to register?
reg1.answer1subtitle: Select this if the vehicle you’re about to register is owned by you.
reg1.answer2subtitle: Select this if the vehicle you’re about to register is owned by someone other than you.

phone.subtitle: We sent verifiation code to your mobile number.

reg2.title: Vehical Registration
reg2.question: Documents required for vehicle registration
reg2.23: National Identity Card of the vehicle owner

choose.title: Please Choose Vehicle
choose.question: Please choose how you would like to partner with us
choose.11: Select this if you vehicle is a Tuk.
choose.21: Select this if you vehicle is a Nano/Car/Mini.
choose.31: Select this if you vehicle is a Minivan/Van.
choose.41: Select this if you vehicle is a Bike.
choose.51: Select this if you vehicle is a Truck.

driving.title: driving licence details
driving.q1: Enter your driving licence details below
driving.q2: Enter your revenue driving licence expiry date below
driving.q3: Enter your revenue insurance expiry  date below
driving.modalTitle: Select your driving licence expiry date
driving.modalTitle2: Select your revenue driving licence expiry date
driving.modalTitle3: Select your revenue insurance expiry date

doc.title: Upload your Documents
doc.subtitle: Please upload your Personal documents below
doc.11: Upload two photos of your national ID
doc.panelsub1: Please upload two photos of your national identity card showing its front side and the back side.
doc.21: Upload two photos of your Driving Licence
doc.panelsub2: Please upload two photos of your Driving Licence card showing its front side and the back side.
doc.31: Upload two photos of Billing Proof
doc.panelsub3: Please Upload photo of Billing Proof. EX : electricity bill,water bill

doc2.title: Upload Vehicle Documents
doc2.subtitle: Please upload your vehicle’s documents below
doc2.11: Upload photos of your Revenue Licence
doc2.panelsub1: Please upload photo of your Revenue Licence
doc2.21: Upload photos of your Vehicle Registration
doc2.panelsub2: Please upload photo of your Vehicle Registration Documents.
doc2.31: Upload photo of your Vehicle Insurance
doc2.panelsub3: Please upload photo of your Vehicle Insurance

complete.title: Successful
complete.subtitle: You complete your signup process successfully.
